title: [Epic] Infra bootstrap
body: Set up core cloud infra for dual-system architecture (VPC, subnets, SGs, S3 bucket, GPU VM, inference VM, IAM).

title: Terraform skeleton
body: Create Terraform modules for VPC, subnets, security groups, S3 bucket with versioning, IAM roles; parameterize instance types and region.

title: Provision GPU training VM
body: Spin up GPU VM with least-privilege IAM and attach role for S3 read/write; add bootstrap script for CUDA/NVIDIA drivers.

title: Provision inference VM
body: Create small VM for FastAPI inference + MLflow client; open port 8000 only from allowlist.

title: Create S3 bucket for data/models
body: Bucket layout: raw/, features/, models/, backtests/, logs/; enable versioning + lifecycle rules.

title: IAM roles and policies
body: Roles: training, inference, executor, analyst-readonly; permissions least-privilege.

title: [Epic] Containers and CI
body: Build standardized images and CI to test and publish.

title: Dockerfile: training
body: CUDA base image; install deps (PyTorch/Sklearn, MLflow); add user; non-root.

title: Dockerfile: inference
body: Python slim + FastAPI + MLflow; healthcheck; non-root.

title: Dockerfile: executor
body: Python slim + broker client; risk rules enforced in code; non-root.

title: GitHub Actions CI
body: On push/PR: lint + unit tests + build images; push to registry when configured.

title: [Epic] Experiment tracking
body: Stand up MLflow and wire training/inference to it.

title: MLflow server setup
body: Host MLflow locally (compose) and in cloud; S3-backed artifacts; configure tracking URI secrets.

title: Training logs to MLflow
body: Ensure params, metrics, artifacts (models, plots) are logged.

title: [Epic] Orchestration & CL (continuous learning)
body: Automate ingest → features → train → backtest → deploy with promotion gates.

title: Prefect project skeleton
body: Create flows: daily_ingest_features, train_backtest_nightly; register schedules.

title: Promotion gates
body: Sharpe>threshold, maxDD<cap, slippage stress pass; block deploy on failure.

title: Shadow trading
body: Run new model in shadow alongside live; compare P&L/latency; auto-promote after N days if stable.

title: [Epic] Executor safety rails
body: Risk controls and audit logging.

title: Position/Exposure limits
body: Hard-coded caps per symbol; daily loss circuit breaker.

title: Immutable decision logs
body: Log input features + model hash + order; store to S3 logs/

title: [Epic] Monitoring
body: Metrics, dashboards, alerts.

title: Grafana board
body: Latency, inference rate, error rate, drawdown, rejects.

title: Alerts
body: Critical anomalies → email/Slack; budget alerts.

title: [Epic] Current Trader Workflow
body: Stabilize and document current on-prem/laptop trader.

title: Map current workflow
body: Document steps, scripts, credentials locations, and job timings.

title: Gap/overlap analysis
body: Compare current trader vs cloud build; tag shared components.

title: Backfill into cloud pipeline
body: Integrate overlapping steps into Prefect flows with minimal disruption.
